sentences.zh: 太史公讀秦記，至犬戎敗幽王，周東徙洛邑，秦襄公始封為諸侯，作西畤用事上帝，僭端見矣。

translations.text: When Sima Qian read the Qin records, reaching the point where the Quanrong defeated King You and Zhou moved east to Luoyi, Qin Duke Xiang was first enfeoffed as a feudal lord, establishing the Western Altar to serve the Supreme Deity, the signs of presumption were already apparent.

sentences.zh: 《禮》曰：「天子祭天地，諸侯祭其域內名山大川。」

translations.text: The Rites say: "The Son of Heaven sacrifices to Heaven and Earth; feudal lords sacrifice to the famous mountains and great rivers within their domains."

sentences.zh: 今秦雜戎翟之俗，先暴戾，後仁義，位在藩臣而臚於郊祀，君子懼焉。

translations.text: Now Qin mixed the customs of the Rong and Di barbarians, first tyrannical and cruel, later benevolent and righteous. Though positioned as a vassal minister, they arrogated the suburban sacrifices. Gentlemen fear this.

sentences.zh: 及文公踰隴，攘夷狄，尊陳寶，營岐雍之閒，而穆公修政，東竟至河，則與齊桓、晉文中國侯伯侔矣。

translations.text: When Duke Wen crossed the Long mountains, drove out the Yi and Di barbarians, honored Chen Bao, and built fortifications between Qi and Yong, Duke Mu implemented good government, and his eastern border reached the Yellow River. He was then equal to Duke Huan of Qi and Duke Wen of Jin, the lords and hegemons of China.

sentences.zh: 是後陪臣執政，大夫世祿，六卿擅晉權，征伐會盟，威重於諸侯。

translations.text: After this, subordinate ministers took power, grand masters held hereditary stipends, the six ministers monopolized Jin's authority, conducting campaigns and alliances, their might heavier than the feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 及田常殺簡公而相齊國，諸侯晏然弗討，海內爭於戰功矣。

translations.text: When Tian Chang killed Duke Jian and became chancellor of Qi, the feudal lords calmly did not punish him. Within the seas, they contended over military achievements.

sentences.zh: 三國終之卒分晉，田和亦滅齊而有之，六國之盛自此始。

translations.text: The three families finally divided Jin, and Tian He also extinguished Qi and possessed it. The flourishing of the six states began from this.

sentences.zh: 務在彊兵并敵，謀詐用而從衡短長之說起。

translations.text: They devoted themselves to strengthening armies and annexing enemies. Plots and deceit were employed, and the theories of horizontal and vertical alliances arose.

sentences.zh: 矯稱蜂出，誓盟不信，雖置質剖符猶不能約束也。

translations.text: They falsely claimed to swarm out like bees, their sworn alliances were untrustworthy. Even placing hostages and splitting tallies could not bind them.

sentences.zh: 秦始小國僻遠，諸夏賓之，比於戎翟，至獻公之後常雄諸侯。

translations.text: Qin began as a small country in a remote place, the various Xia treated it as a guest, comparing it to the Rong and Di, but after Duke Xian it constantly dominated the feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 論秦之德義不如魯衛之暴戾者，量秦之兵不如三晉之彊也，然卒并天下，非必險固便形勢利也，蓋若天所助焉。

translations.text: If we discuss Qin's virtue and righteousness, it was not as good as the tyranny of Lu and Wei; if we measure Qin's troops, they were not as strong as the three Jin states. Yet it finally united the world. This was not necessarily because of dangerous terrain and advantageous positions, but rather as if Heaven assisted it.

When Sima Qian read the Qin records, reaching the point where the Quanrong defeated King You and Zhou moved east to Luoyi, Qin Duke Xiang was first enfeoffed as a feudal lord, establishing the Western Altar to serve the Supreme Deity, the signs of presumption were already apparent. The Rites say: "The Son of Heaven sacrifices to Heaven and Earth; feudal lords sacrifice to the famous mountains and great rivers within their domains." Now Qin mixed the customs of the Rong and Di barbarians, first tyrannical and cruel, later benevolent and righteous. Though positioned as a vassal minister, they arrogated the suburban sacrifices. Gentlemen fear this. When Duke Wen crossed the Long mountains, drove out the Yi and Di barbarians, honored Chen Bao, and built fortifications between Qi and Yong, Duke Mu implemented good government, and his eastern border reached the Yellow River. He was then equal to Duke Huan of Qi and Duke Wen of Jin, the lords and hegemons of China. After this, subordinate ministers took power, grand masters held hereditary stipends, the six ministers monopolized Jin's authority, conducting campaigns and alliances, their might heavier than the feudal lords. When Tian Chang killed Duke Jian and became chancellor of Qi, the feudal lords calmly did not punish him. Within the seas, they contended over military achievements. The three families finally divided Jin, and Tian He also extinguished Qi and possessed it. The flourishing of the six states began from this. They devoted themselves to strengthening armies and annexing enemies. Plots and deceit were employed, and the theories of horizontal and vertical alliances arose. They falsely claimed to swarm out like bees, their sworn alliances were untrustworthy. Even placing hostages and splitting tallies could not bind them. Qin began as a small country in a remote place, the various Xia treated it as a guest, comparing it to the Rong and Di, but after Duke Xian it constantly dominated the feudal lords. If we discuss Qin's virtue and righteousness, it was not as good as the tyranny of Lu and Wei; if we measure Qin's troops, they were not as strong as the three Jin states. Yet it finally united the world. This was not necessarily because of dangerous terrain and advantageous positions, but rather as if Heaven assisted it.

sentences.zh: 或曰「東方物所始生，西方物之成孰」。

translations.text: Some say: "Eastern things are where all things begin to be born; western things are where all things reach maturity."

sentences.zh: 夫作事者必於東南，收功實者常於西北。

translations.text: Those who undertake affairs must do so in the southeast; those who reap actual achievements are constantly in the northwest.

sentences.zh: 故禹興於西羌，湯起於亳，周之王也以豐鎬伐殷，秦之帝用雍州興，漢之興自蜀漢。

translations.text: Therefore Yu arose from the western Qiang, Tang rose from Bo, King Zhou used Feng and Hao to attack Yin, Qin used Yong province to rise to imperial power, and Han arose from Shu and Han.

Some say: "Eastern things are where all things begin to be born; western things are where all things reach maturity." Those who undertake affairs must do so in the southeast; those who reap actual achievements are constantly in the northwest. Therefore Yu arose from the western Qiang, Tang rose from Bo, King Zhou used Feng and Hao to attack Yin, Qin used Yong province to rise to imperial power, and Han arose from Shu and Han.

sentences.zh: 秦既得意，燒天下詩書，諸侯史記尤甚，為其有所刺譏也。

translations.text: After Qin achieved its ambitions, it burned the world's poetry and books. The records of the feudal lords were especially severe, because they contained criticisms.

sentences.zh: 詩書所以復見者，多藏人家，而史記獨藏周室，以故滅。

translations.text: The reason poetry and books reappeared was that they were extensively stored in people's homes, but the historical records were uniquely stored in the Zhou court, so they were extinguished.
What a pity, what a pity!

sentences.zh: 獨有秦記，又不載日月，其文略不具。

translations.text: Only the Qin records remained, but they did not record dates and months, their text was brief and incomplete.

sentences.zh: 然戰國之權變亦有可頗采者，何必上古。

translations.text: However, the stratagems and changes of the Warring States also have much that is worthy of selection. Why must it be ancient times?

sentences.zh: 秦取天下多暴，然世異變，成功大。

translations.text: Qin took the world with much tyranny, yet eras change and transform, and great success was achieved.
The tradition says "follow later kings." Why is this?

sentences.zh: 以其近己而俗變相類，議卑而易行也。

translations.text: Because they are close to us, and customs and changes are similar, the discussions are lowly and easy to carry out.

sentences.zh: 學者牽於所聞，見秦在帝位日淺，不察其終始，因舉而笑之，不敢道，此與以耳食無異。

translations.text: Scholars are constrained by what they have heard. Seeing that Qin's time on the imperial throne was brief, they do not examine its beginning and end, and thus laugh at it dismissively, not daring to discuss it. This is no different from accepting hearsay without verification.
How lamentable!

After Qin achieved its ambitions, it burned the world's poetry and books. The records of the feudal lords were especially severe, because they contained criticisms. The reason poetry and books reappeared was that they were extensively stored in people's homes, but the historical records were uniquely stored in the Zhou court, so they were extinguished. What a pity, what a pity! Only the Qin records remained, but they did not record dates and months, their text was brief and incomplete. However, the stratagems and changes of the Warring States also have much that is worthy of selection. Why must it be ancient times? Qin took the world with much tyranny, yet eras change and transform, and great success was achieved. The tradition says "follow later kings." Why is this? Because they are close to us, and customs and changes are similar, the discussions are lowly and easy to carry out. Scholars are constrained by what they have heard. Seeing that Qin's time on the imperial throne was brief, they do not examine its beginning and end, and thus laugh at it dismissively, not daring to discuss it. This is no different from accepting hearsay without verification. How lamentable!

sentences.zh: 余於是因秦記，踵春秋之後，起周元王，表六國時事，訖二世，凡二百七十年，著諸所聞興壞之端。

translations.text: Therefore I have followed the Qin records, continued after the Spring and Autumn Annals, beginning from King Yuan of Zhou, tabulating the events of the six states period, ending with the Second Emperor, altogether 270 years, recording the trends of rise and fall that I have heard about.
Later gentlemen may peruse and observe them.

Therefore I have followed the Qin records, continued after the Spring and Autumn Annals, beginning from King Yuan of Zhou, tabulating the events of the six states period, ending with the Second Emperor, altogether 270 years, recording the trends of rise and fall that I have heard about. Later gentlemen may peruse and observe them.
301 BC, 14th year, 6th month.

sentences.zh: 蜀反，司馬錯往誅蜀守煇，定蜀。

translations.text: Shu rebelled, Sima Cuo went to execute the Shu governor Hui and pacified Shu.
Solar eclipse, daytime darkness.
Attacked Chu.
18th year.
Attacked Chu with Qin.
11th year.
Qin took our Rang.
Attacked Chu with Qin.
25th year.
Zhao attacked Zhongshan.
Queen Dowager Hui died.
28th year.

sentences.zh: 秦、韓、魏、齊敗我將軍唐眛於重丘。

translations.text: Qin, Han, Wei, and Qi defeated our general Tang Mei at Chongqiu.
11th year, 23rd day.

sentences.zh: 與秦擊楚，使公子將，大有功。

translations.text: Attacked Chu with Qin, sent the prince as general, achieved great merit.
284 BC, 31st year, 23rd day.

sentences.zh: 尉斯離與韓、魏、燕、趙共擊齊，破之。

translations.text: Yu Si Li together with Han, Wei, Yan, and Zhao attacked Qi and defeated them.
12th year.
Attacked Qi west of Ji with Qin.
Met with the Qin king at Western Zhou.
12th year.
Attacked Qi west of Ji with Qin.
與秦王會西周。
十五。
取齊昔陽。
十五。
取齊淮北。
二十八。

sentences.zh: 與秦、三晉擊齊，燕獨入至臨菑，取其寶器。

translations.text: 與秦、三晉擊齊，燕獨入至臨菑，取其寶器。
四十。
五國共擊湣王，王走莒。
Year
Zhou
Lu
Qi
Jin
Qin
Chu
Song
Wei

cells.translation: 2nd year. Shu people came to offer tribute.
6th year. Yiqu came to offer tribute. Mian Zhu sought aid.
18th year. Cai Sheng Hou, first year.

cells.content: 衛出公飲，大夫不解襪，公怒，即攻公，公奔宋。
cells.translation: Wei Chu Gong drank, the grand officers did not remove their socks, the duke was angry, attacked the grand officers, they fled to Song.
19th year. Prince Zi Ying fled to Qin.

cells.content: 十。庶長將兵拔魏城。彗星見。
二十三。魯悼公元年。三桓勝，魯如小侯。
cells.translation: 23rd year. Lu Dao Gong, first year. The Three Huan were victorious, Lu became like a small marquis.

cells.content: 知伯伐鄭，駟桓子如齊求救。
五十四。知伯謂簡子，欲廢太子襄子，襄子怨知伯。
cells.translation: 54th year. Zhi Bo told Jian Zi that he wanted to depose the crown prince Xiang Zi, Xiang Zi resented Zhi Bo.

cells.content: 十七。救鄭，晉師去。中行文子謂田常：「乃今知所以亡。」
十六。塹阿旁。伐大荔。補龐戲城。
cells.translation: 16th year. Dug trenches around the slopes. Attacked Dali. Repaired Pangxi city.
20th year. The duke led troops to battle Mian Zhu.

cells.content: 襄子。元年未除服，登夏屋，誘代王，以金斗殺代王。封伯魯子周為代成君。

cells.translation: 32nd year. Cai Sheng Hou passed away.
Jin Ai Gong Ji, first year.
33rd year. Cai Yuan Hou, first year.
Wei Dao Gong Qian, first year.
Qi Xuan Gong Jiu Za, first year.
4th year. Divided Fan and Zhonghang territory with Zhi Bo.
Han Kang Zi defeated Zhi Bo at Jinyang.

cells.content: 五。襄子敗智伯晉陽，與魏、韓三分其地。
二十五。晉大夫智開率其邑來奔。

cells.translation: 26th year. Left Chancellor built walls at Nandeng.
5th year. Song Jing Gong passed away.
Emperor Yuan of Han ascended the throne.
39th year. Cai Hou Qi, first year.
6th year. Song Zhao Gong, first year.

cells.content: 二十九。晉大夫智寬率其邑人來奔。
cells.translation: 29th year. Jin grand officer Zhi Kuan led his townspeople to defect.
33rd year. Attacked Yiqu, captured their king.
Jin You Gong Liu, first year. Subjugated Han and Wei.
8th year. Sixth month, snow fell. Sun and moon eclipsed.

cells.content: 十三。義渠伐秦，侵至渭陽。
cells.translation: 13th year. Yiqu attacked Qin, invaded as far as Weiyang.
Qin Huai Gong, first year. Ling Gong was born.
4th year. Lu Yuan Gong, first year.

cells.content: 四。庶長晁殺懷公。太子蚤死，大臣立太子之子，為靈公。

cells.translation: Wei Dao Gong Wei, first year.
Wei Wen Hou Si, first year.
2nd year. Zheng You Gong, first year. Han killed him.

cells.content: 三。鄭立幽公子，為繻公，元年。
五。魏誅晉幽公，立其弟止。
cells.translation: 5th year. Wei executed Jin You Gong, established his younger brother Zhi.

cells.content: 六。晉烈公止元年。魏城���梁。
八。城塹河瀕。初以君主妻河。
cells.translation: 8th year. Built city walls along the river banks. First time using the ruler to sacrifice to the river.

cells.content: 十。補龐，城籍姑。靈公卒，立其季父悼子，是為簡公。
cells.translation: 10th year. Repaired Pang, built walls at Jigu. Ling Gong passed away, established his uncle Dao Zi, this was Jian Gong.
11th year. Wei Shen Gong, first year.
10th year. Zhongshan Wu Gong first ascended the throne.
2nd year. Fought with Jin, defeated Zheng at Xia.

cells.content: 四十三。伐晉，毀黃城，圍陽狐。
cells.translation: 43rd year. Attacked Jin, destroyed Huang city, besieged Yanghu.

cells.content: 十三。公子擊圍繁龐，出其民。
cells.translation: 13th year. Prince Ji besieged Fanpang, expelled its people.
6th year. First ordered officials to wear swords.

cells.content: 十七。擊守中山。伐秦至鄭，還築洛陰、合陽。
cells.translation: 17th year. Attacked and defended Zhongshan. Attacked Qin to Zheng, returned and built Luoyin and Heyang.

cells.content: 韓景侯虔元年。伐鄭，取雍丘。鄭城京。
趙烈侯籍元年。魏使太子伐中山。
cells.translation: Zhao Lie Hou Ji, first year. Wei sent the crown prince to attack Zhongshan.

cells.content: 十八。文侯受經子夏。過段干木之閭常式。

cells.translation: 2nd year. Zheng defeated Han at Fushu.

cells.content: 楚聲王當元年。魯穆公元年
cells.translation: Chu Sheng Wang Dang, first year. Lu Mu Gong, first year.

cells.content: 四十九。與鄭會于西城。伐衛，取毌。
cells.translation: 49th year. Met with Zheng at Xicheng. Attacked Wei, took Wu.
51st year. Tian Hui rebelled from Linqiu.
5th year. Wei, Han, and Zhao first ranked as feudal lords.
2nd year. Song Dao Gong, first year.

cells.content: 七。烈侯好音，欲賜歌者田，徐越侍以仁義，乃止。
cells.translation: 7th year. Marquis Lie enjoyed music and wanted to grant fields to singers, but Xu Yue counseled him with benevolence and righteousness, so he stopped.
Chu Dao Wang Lei, first year.
25th year. Crown Prince Ying was born.

cells.content: 四。敗鄭師，圍鄭。鄭人殺子陽。
三。（鄭人殺君）三月，盜殺韓相俠累。
cells.translation: 3rd year. (Zheng people killed their ruler) In the third month, bandits killed Han Prime Minister Xia Lei.

cells.content: 四。鄭相子陽之徒殺其君繻公。

cells.translation: 5th year. Zheng Kang Gong, first year.
10th year. Song Xiu Gong, first year.
9th year. Attacked Han, Took 負黍...
9th year. Attacked Han宜陽, Took 六邑...
9th year. QinAttacked 宜陽, Took 六邑...

cells.content: 魏武侯。。元年。襲邯鄲，敗焉。
cells.translation: Wei Wu Hou, first year. Attacked Handan, was defeated.

cells.content: 趙敬侯元年。武公子朝作亂，奔魏。
cells.translation: Zhao Jing Hou, first year. Wu Gong Zi Chao rebelled, fled to Wei.

cells.content: 十九。田常曾孫田和始列為諸侯。遷康公海上，食一城。
二。庶長改迎靈公太子，立為獻公。誅出公。
cells.translation: 2nd year. 2nd year. 庶長改迎靈公太子, ascended the throne.為獻公.誅出公.

cells.content: 二。伐鄭，取陽城。伐宋，到彭城，執宋君。
cells.translation: 2nd year. 2nd year. Attacked Zheng, Took 陽城.伐Song, 到彭城, 執Song君...
20th year. Attacked Lu, 破之.田和 passed away...

cells.content: 二十一。田和子桓公午立。

cells.translation: 6th year. 初縣蒲、藍田、善明氏.

cells.content: 二十六。康公卒，田氏遂并齊而有之。太公望之後絕祀。
cells.translation: 康公 passed away., 田氏遂并Qi而有之.太公望之後絕祀.

cells.content: 九。翟敗我澮。伐齊，至靈丘。
cells.translation: 9th year. 翟Defeated 我澮.Attacked Qi, 至靈丘...

cells.content: 齊威王因元年。自田常至威王，威王始以齊彊天下。
十一。魏、韓、趙滅晉，絕無後。
二。滅鄭。康公二十年滅，無後。
cells.translation: 2nd year. 2nd year. 滅Zheng.康公二十年滅, 無後.

cells.content: 六。魯伐入陽關。晉伐到鱄陵。
cells.translation: 6th year. LuAttacked 入陽關.Jin伐到鱄陵..

cells.content: 十五。衛聲公元年。敗趙北藺。
cells.translation: 15th year. Wei聲公, first year..Defeated Zhao北藺..

cells.content: 三。伐衛，取都鄙七十三。魏敗我藺。
cells.translation: 3rd year. 3rd year. Attacked Wei, Took 都鄙七十三.WeiDefeated 我藺....
5th year. Attacked Qi于甄.WeiDefeated 我懷...
Chu Xuan Wang Liang Fu, first year.

cells.content: 十七。櫟陽雨金，四月至八月。
十一。伐魏取觀。趙侵我長城。
二十一。章蟜與晉戰石門，。。斬首六萬，天子賀。
二十三。與魏戰少梁，虜其太子。
九。與秦戰少梁，虜我太子。
cells.translation: 9th year. 與Qin戰少梁, Captured 我太子..

cells.content: 九。魏敗我于澮。大雨三月。
秦孝公元年。彗星見西方。
cells.translation: Qin Xiao Gong, first year. Comet seen in the west.

cells.content: 十。取趙皮牢。衛成侯元年。
韓昭侯元年。秦敗我西山。
二十一。鄒忌以鼓琴見威王。
二。宋取我黃池。魏取我朱。
cells.translation: 2nd year. 2nd year. SongTook 我黃池.Wei取我朱..

cells.content: 十九。與燕會阿。與齊、宋會平陸。
十六。與秦孝公會杜平。侵宋黃池，宋復取之。
八。與魏戰元里，斬首七千，取少梁。
十七。與秦戰元里，秦取我少梁。
cells.translation: 17th year. 與Qin戰元里, QinTook 我少梁..

cells.content: 十八。邯鄲降。齊敗我桂陵。

cells.translation: 6th year. Attacked 東周, Took 陵觀、廩丘...

cells.content: 十。衛公孫鞅為大良造，伐安邑，降之。
十九。諸侯圍我襄陵。築長城，塞固陽。
cells.translation: 19th year. 諸侯圍我襄陵.築長城, 塞固陽.

cells.content: 十一。城商塞。衛鞅圍固陽，降之。
cells.translation: 11th year. 城商塞.Wei鞅圍固陽, 降之.

cells.content: 二十四。魏歸邯鄲，與魏盟漳水上。
十二。初聚小邑為三十一縣，令。為田開阡陌。
三。公子范襲邯鄲，不勝，死。
二十七。丹封名會。丹，魏大臣。
十九。城武城。從東方牡丘來歸。天子致伯。
cells.translation: 19th year. 城武城.從東方牡丘來歸.天子致伯.

cells.content: 二十。諸侯畢賀。會諸侯于澤。朝天子。
三十。齊虜我太子申，殺將軍龐涓。
二。敗魏馬陵。田忌、田嬰、田馊將，孫子為師。
cells.translation: 2nd year. 2nd year. Defeated Wei馬陵.田忌、田嬰、田馊將, 孫子為師..

cells.content: 三十一。秦商君伐我，虜我公子卬。
cells.translation: 31st year. Qin商君Attacked 我, Captured 我公子卬...
Chu Wei Wang Xiong Shang, first year.

cells.content: 二十四。（秦）大荔圍合陽。孝公薨。商君反，死彤地。
三十三。衛鞅亡歸我，我恐，弗內。
cells.translation: 33rd year. Wei鞅亡歸我, 我恐, 弗內.

cells.content: 秦惠文王元年。楚、韓、趙、蜀人來。
cells.translation: Qin Hui Wen Wang, first year. People from Chu, Han, Zhao, and Shu came.

cells.content: 二。天子賀。行錢。宋太丘社亡。
三十五。孟子來，王問利國，對曰：「君不可言利。」
cells.translation: 孟子來, 王問利國, 對曰：「君不可言利.」

cells.content: 四。天子致文武胙。魏夫人來。
魏襄王元年。與諸侯會徐州，以相王。
cells.translation: Wei Xiang Wang, first year. Met with the feudal lords at Xuzhou, mutually recognized as kings.

cells.content: 二十五。旱。作高門，屈宜臼曰「昭侯不出此門。」
九。與魏會徐州，諸侯相王。
五。陰晉人犀首為大良造。
cells.translation: 5th year. 陰Jin人犀首為大良造.

cells.content: 二十六。高門成，昭侯卒，不出此門。
cells.translation: 高門成, 昭侯 passed away., 不出此門.

cells.content: 六。魏以陰晉為和，命曰寧秦。
cells.translation: 6th year. Wei以陰Jin為和, 命曰寧Qin.
Han Xuan Hui Wang, first year.

cells.content: 十八。齊、魏伐我，我決河水浸之。
七。義渠內亂，庶長操將兵定之。
五。與秦河西地少梁。秦圍我焦、曲沃。
九。度河，取汾陰、皮氏。圍焦，降之。與魏會應。
六。與秦會應。秦取汾陰、皮氏。
cells.translation: 6th year. 與Qin會應.QinTook 汾陰、皮氏..

cells.content: 十。張儀相。公子桑圍蒲陽，降之。魏納上郡。
cells.translation: 10th year. 張儀相.公子桑圍蒲陽, 降之.Wei納上郡.
Chu Huai Wang Huai, first year.

cells.content: 十一。義渠君為臣。歸魏焦、曲沃。
趙武靈王元年。魏敗我趙護。
cells.translation: Zhao Wu Ling Wang, first year. Wei defeated our Zhao Hu.

cells.content: 相張儀將兵取陝。初更元年
cells.translation: Prime Minister Zhang Yi led troops to take Shan. First year of the new calendar.

cells.content: 二。相張儀與齊、楚會齧桑。

cells.translation: 3rd year. 3rd year. 張儀免相, 相Wei.

cells.content: 十三。秦取曲沃。平周女化為丈夫。

cells.translation: 5th year. 王北遊戎地, 至河上.

cells.content: 七。五國共擊秦，不勝而還。
cells.translation: 7th year. 五國共擊Qin, 不勝而還.
6th year. Song自 ascended the throne.為王.

cells.content: 八。與韓、趙戰，斬首八萬。張儀復相。
十六。秦敗我脩魚，得將軍申差。
九。與韓、魏擊秦。齊敗我觀澤。
九。擊蜀，滅之。取趙中都、西陽。
cells.translation: 9th year. 擊蜀, 滅之.Took Zhao中都、西陽..

cells.content: 五。君讓其臣子之國，顧為臣。
十一。侵義渠，得二十五城。
cells.translation: 11th year. 侵Yiqu, 得二十五城.

cells.content: 五。秦拔我曲沃，歸其人。走犀首岸門。
cells.translation: 5th year. Qin拔我曲沃, 歸其人.走犀首岸門.

cells.content: 七。君噲及太子相子之皆死。
cells.translation: 7th year. 君噲及太子相子之皆死.

cells.content: 十二。樗里子擊藺陽，虜趙將。公子繇通封蜀。
cells.translation: 12th year. 樗里子擊藺陽, Captured Zhao將.公子繇通封蜀..

cells.content: 六。秦來立公子政為太子。與秦王會臨晉。
cells.translation: 6th year. Qin來 ascended the throne.公子政為太子.與Qin王會臨Jin.

cells.content: 十三。秦拔我藺，虜將趙莊。
cells.translation: 13th year. Qin拔我藺, Captured 將Zhao莊..

cells.content: 十三。庶長章擊楚，斬首八萬。
cells.translation: 13th year. 庶長章擊Chu, 斬首八萬.

cells.content: 七。擊齊，虜聲子於濮。與秦擊燕。
cells.translation: 7th year. 擊Qi, Captured 聲子於濮.與Qin擊Yan..

cells.content: 二十一。我秦攻楚，圍景座。

cells.translation: 9th year. Yan人共 ascended the throne.公子平.
King Xiang of Han, first year
King Zhao of Yan, first year

cells.content: 秦武王元年。誅蜀相壯。張儀、魏章皆出之魏。
cells.translation: Qin武王元年.誅蜀相壯.張儀、Wei章皆出之Wei.

cells.content: 十六。吳廣入女，生子何，立為惠王后。
cells.translation: 16th year. 吳廣入女, 生子何, ascended the throne.為惠王后.

cells.content: 二。初置丞相，樗里子、甘茂為丞相。
cells.translation: 2nd year. 2nd year. 初置丞相, 樗里子、甘茂為丞相.

cells.content: 四。與秦會臨晉。秦擊我宜陽。
四。拔宜陽城，斬首六萬。涉河，城武遂。
cells.translation: 4th year. 拔宜陽城, 斬首六萬.涉河, 城武遂.

cells.content: 五。秦拔我宜陽，斬首六萬。
cells.translation: 5th year. Qin拔我宜陽, 斬首六萬.
King Zhao Xiang of Qin, first year

cells.content: 十三。秦擊皮氏，未拔而解。
cells.translation: 13th year. Qin擊皮氏, 未拔而解.
2nd year. 2nd year. 彗星見.桑君為亂, 誅.

cells.content: 二十五。與秦王會黃觉，秦復歸我上庸。
cells.translation: 與Qin王會黃觉, Qin復歸我上庸.

cells.content: 十六。秦拔我蒲阪、晉陽、封陵。
十七。與秦會臨晉，復歸我蒲阪。
cells.translation: 17th year. 與Qin會臨Jin, 復歸我蒲阪.

cells.content: 十。太子嬰與秦王會臨晉，因至咸陽而歸。
cells.translation: 10th year. 太子嬰與Qin王會臨Jin, 因至咸陽而歸.

cells.content: 六。蜀反，司馬錯往誅蜀守煇，定蜀。日蝕，晝晦。伐楚。
cells.translation: 6th year. 蜀反, 司馬錯往誅蜀守煇, 定蜀.Solar eclipse, 晝晦.Attacked Chu..

cells.content: 十一。秦取我穰。與秦擊楚。
二十五。趙攻中山。惠后卒。
二十八。秦、韓、魏、齊敗我將軍唐眛於重丘。
cells.translation: Qin、Han、Wei、QiDefeated 我將軍唐眛於重丘..

cells.content: 二十三。與秦擊楚，使公子將，大有功。
cells.translation: 23rd year. 與Qin擊Chu, 使公子將, 大有功.

cells.content: 七。樗里疾卒。擊楚，斬首三萬。魏冉為相。
cells.translation: 7th year. 樗里疾 passed away..擊Chu, 斬首三萬.Wei冉為相.

cells.content: 二十九。秦取我襄城，殺景缺。
cells.translation: QinTook 我襄城, 殺景缺..

cells.content: 二十四。秦使涇陽君來為質。
十三。齊、魏王來。立咎為太子。
cells.translation: 13th year. Qi、Wei王來. ascended the throne.咎為太子.

cells.content: 三十。王入秦。秦取我八城。
二十五。涇陽君復歸秦。薛文入相秦。
二十一。與齊、韓共擊秦于函谷。河、渭絕一日。
cells.translation: 21st year. 與Qi、Han共擊Qin于函谷.河、渭絕一日.

cells.content: 趙惠文王元年。以公子勝為相，封平原君。
cells.translation: Zhao惠文王元年.以公子勝為相, 封平原君.

cells.content: 楚頃襄王元年。秦取我十六城
cells.translation: Chu頃襄王元年.Qin取我十六城

cells.content: 二十六。與魏、韓共擊秦。孟嘗君歸相齊。
十。楚懷王亡之趙，趙弗內。
cells.translation: 10th year. Chu懷王亡之Zhao, Zhao弗內.
2nd year. 2nd year. Chu懷王亡來, 弗內.

cells.content: 十一。彗星見。復與魏封陵。
十六。（與齊魏擊秦）秦與我武遂和。

cells.translation: 3rd year. 3rd year. 懷王 passed away.于Qin, 來歸葬.

cells.content: 十二。樓緩免。穰侯魏冉為丞相。
cells.translation: 12th year. 樓緩免.穰侯Wei冉為丞相.

cells.content: 魏昭王元年。秦尉錯來擊我襄。
cells.translation: Wei昭王元年.Qin尉錯來擊我襄.
King Xi of Han, Jiu, first year

cells.content: 四。圍殺主父。與齊、燕共滅中山。

cells.translation: 2nd year. 2nd year. 與Qin戰, 我不利.

cells.content: 三十。田甲劫王，相薛文走。
十四。白起擊伊闕，斬首二十四萬。
cells.translation: 14th year. 白起擊伊闕, 斬首二十四萬.

cells.content: 三。佐韓擊秦，秦敗我兵伊闕。
cells.translation: 3rd year. 3rd year. 佐Han擊Qin, QinDefeated 我兵伊闕..

cells.content: 三。秦敗我伊闕，斬首二十四萬，虜將喜。
cells.translation: 3rd year. 3rd year. QinDefeated 我伊闕, 斬首二十四萬, Captured 將喜...

cells.content: 六。與秦武遂地方二百里。
cells.translation: 6th year. 與Qin武遂地方二百里.

cells.content: 十八。客卿錯擊魏，至軹，取城大小六十一。
cells.translation: 18th year. 客卿錯擊Wei, 至軹, Took 城大小六十一..

cells.content: 七。秦擊我。取城大小六十一。
cells.translation: 7th year. Qin擊我.Took 城大小六十一..

cells.content: 十九。十月為帝，十二月復為王。任鄙卒。
cells.translation: 19th year. 十月為帝, 十二月復為王.任鄙 passed away..

cells.content: 三十六。為東帝二月，復為王。
cells.translation: 為東帝二月, 復為王.

cells.content: 九。秦拔我新垣、曲陽之城。
cells.translation: 9th year. Qin拔我新垣、曲陽之城.

cells.content: 二十一。魏納安邑及河內。
二十三。尉斯離與韓、魏、燕、趙共擊齊，破之。
cells.translation: 23rd year. 尉斯離與Han、Wei、Yan、Zhao共擊Qi, 破之.

cells.content: 十二。與秦擊齊濟西。與秦王會西周。
cells.translation: 12th year. 與Qin擊Qi濟西.與Qin王會西周.

cells.content: 十二。與秦擊齊濟西。與秦王會西周。
cells.translation: 12th year. 與Qin擊Qi濟西.與Qin王會西周.

cells.content: 二十八。與秦、三晉擊齊，燕獨入至臨菑，取其寶器。
cells.translation: 與Qin、三Jin擊Qi, Yan獨入至臨菑, Took 其寶器..

cells.content: 四十。五國共擊湣王，王走莒。
cells.translation: 五國共擊湣王, 王走Ju.

cells.content: 十三。秦拔我安城，兵至大梁而還。
cells.translation: 13th year. Qin拔我安城, 兵至大梁而還.
King Xiang of Qi, Fa Zhang, first year
14th year. 大水.Wei懷君, first year..

cells.content: 二十七。擊趙，斬首三萬。地動，壞城。
cells.translation: 擊Zhao, 斬首三萬.地動, 壞城.

cells.content: 十九。秦敗我軍，斬首三萬。
cells.translation: 19th year. QinDefeated 我軍, 斬首三萬..

cells.content: 十九。秦擊我，與秦漢北及上庸地。
cells.translation: 19th year. Qin擊我, 與Qin漢北及上庸地.

cells.content: 二十。與秦會黽池，藺相如從。
cells.translation: 20th year. 與Qin會黽池, 藺相如從.

cells.content: 二十九。白起擊楚，拔郢，更東至竟陵，以為南郡。
cells.translation: 白起擊Chu, 拔郢, 更東至竟陵, 以為南郡.

cells.content: 二十一。秦拔我郢，燒夷陵，王亡走陳。
cells.translation: 21st year. Qin拔我郢, 燒夷陵, 王亡走Chen.
King Hui of Yan, first year

cells.content: 魏安釐王元年。秦拔我兩城。封弟公子無忌為信陵君。
cells.translation: Wei安釐王元年.Qin拔我兩城.封弟公子無忌為信陵君.

cells.content: 二十三。秦所拔我江旁反秦。
二。秦拔我兩城，軍大梁下，韓來救，與秦溫以和。
cells.translation: 2nd year. 2nd year. Qin拔我兩城, 軍大梁下, Han來救, 與Qin溫以和.

cells.content: 二十一。暴鳶救魏，為秦所敗，走開封。
cells.translation: 21st year. 暴鳶救Wei, 為Qin所Defeated , 走開封..

cells.content: 三。秦拔我四城，斬首四萬。
cells.translation: 3rd year. 3rd year. Qin拔我四城, 斬首四萬.

cells.content: 三十四。白起擊魏華陽軍，芒卯走，得三晉將，斬首十五萬。
cells.translation: 白起擊Wei華陽軍, 芒卯走, 得三Jin將, 斬首十五萬.
King Huan Hui of Han, first year

cells.content: 二十七。擊燕。魯頃公元年。
二十八。藺相如攻齊，至平邑。

cells.translation: King Wu Cheng of Yan, first year
3rd year. 3rd year. Qin擊我閼與城, 不拔.

cells.content: 二十九。秦攻韓閼與。趙奢將擊秦，大敗之，賜號曰馬服。
cells.translation: Qin攻Han閼與.Zhao奢將擊Qin, 大Defeated 之, 賜號曰馬服..

cells.content: 四十。太子質於魏者死，歸葬芷陽。
cells.translation: 太子質於Wei者死, 歸葬芷陽.

cells.content: 四十二。宣太后薨。安國君為太子。
cells.translation: 42nd year. 宣太后 passed away..安國君為太子.

cells.content: 趙孝成王元年。秦拔我三城。平原君相。
cells.translation: Zhao孝成王元年.Qin拔我三城.平原君相.
King Jian of Qi, first year

cells.content: 楚考烈王元年。秦取我州。黃歇為相。
cells.translation: Chu考烈王元年.Qin取我州.黃歇為相.

cells.content: 四十七。白起破趙長平，殺卒四十五萬。
cells.translation: 白起破Zhao長平, 殺 passed away.四十五萬.

cells.content: 六。使趙括代廉頗將。白起破括四十五萬。
cells.translation: 6th year. 使Zhao括代廉頗將.白起破括四十五萬.

cells.content: 五十。王齕、鄭安平圍邯鄲，及齕還軍，拔新中。
cells.translation: 王齕、Zheng安平圍邯鄲, 及齕還軍, 拔新中.

cells.content: 二十。公子無忌救邯鄲，秦兵解去。
cells.translation: 20th year. 公子無忌救邯鄲, Qin兵解去.

cells.content: 九。秦圍我邯鄲，楚、魏救我。
cells.translation: 9th year. Qin圍我邯鄲, Chu、Wei救我.
King Xiao of Yan, first year

cells.content: 二十一。韓、魏、楚救趙新中，秦兵罷。
十七。秦擊我陽城，救趙新中。
cells.translation: 17th year. Qin擊我陽城, 救Zhao新中.

cells.content: 五十二。。取西周。王稽棄市。

cells.translation: King Xi of Yan, first year

cells.content: 四。伐趙，趙破我軍，殺栗腹。
cells.translation: 4th year. Attacked Zhao, Zhao破我軍, 殺栗腹..

cells.content: 秦莊襄王楚元年。。蒙驁取成皋、滎陽。初置三川郡。呂不韋相。取東周。
cells.translation: Qin莊襄王Chu元年..蒙驁取成皋、滎陽.初置三川郡.呂不韋相.取東周.

cells.content: 二十四。秦拔我成皋、滎陽。
十四。楚滅魯，頃公遷卞，為家人，絕祀。
cells.translation: 14th year. Chu滅Lu, 頃公遷卞, 為家人, 絕祀.

cells.content: 二。蒙驁擊趙榆次、新城、狼孟，得三十七城。日蝕。
cells.translation: 2nd year. 2nd year. 蒙驁擊Zhao榆次、新城、狼孟, 得三十七城.Solar eclipse.

cells.content: 三。王齮擊上黨。初置太原郡。魏公子無忌率五國卻我軍河外，蒙驁解去，
cells.translation: 3rd year. 3rd year. 王齮擊上黨.初置太原郡.Wei公子無忌率五國卻我軍河外, 蒙驁解去,

cells.content: 三十。無忌率五國兵敗秦軍河外。
cells.translation: 無忌率五國兵Defeated Qin軍河外..

cells.content: 始皇帝元年。。擊取晉陽，作鄭國渠。
cells.translation: 始皇帝元年..擊取Jin陽, 作Zheng國渠.

cells.content: 三。蒙驁擊韓，取十三城。王齮死。
cells.translation: 3rd year. 3rd year. 蒙驁擊Han, Took 十三城.王齮死..
King Dao Xiang of Zhao, Yan, first year

cells.content: 四。七月，蝗蔽天下。百姓納粟千石，拜爵一級。
cells.translation: 4th year. 七月, 蝗蔽天下.百姓納粟千石, 拜爵一級.

cells.content: 五。蒙驁取魏酸棗二十城。初置東郡。
cells.translation: 5th year. 蒙驁Took Wei酸棗二十城.初置東郡..

cells.content: 魏景湣王元年。秦拔我二十城。
cells.translation: Wei景湣王元年.Qin拔我二十城.
3rd year. 3rd year. Zhao相、Wei相會柯, 盟.

cells.content: 二。秦拔我朝歌。衛從濮陽徙野王。
cells.translation: 2nd year. 2nd year. Qin拔我朝歌.Wei從濮陽徙野王.

cells.content: 二十二。王東徙壽春，命曰郢。
cells.translation: 22nd year. 王東徙壽春, 命曰郢.

cells.content: 七。彗星見北方西方。夏太后薨。蒙驁死。
cells.translation: 7th year. 彗星見北方西方.夏太后 passed away..蒙驁死.

cells.content: 九。彗星見，竟天。嫪毐為亂，遷其舍人于蜀。彗星復見。
cells.translation: 9th year. 彗星見, 竟天.嫪毐為亂, 遷其舍人于蜀.彗星復見.
King An of Han, first year

cells.content: 十。相國呂不韋免。齊、趙來，置酒。太后入咸陽。大索。
cells.translation: 10th year. Prime Minister Lü Buwei was dismissed. Qi and Zhao came, a banquet was held. The Empress Dowager entered Xianyang. A great search was conducted.
King You Dao of Chu, first year

cells.content: 十一。呂不韋之河南。王翦擊鄴、閼與，取九城。
cells.translation: 11th year. 呂不韋之河南.王翦擊鄴、閼與, Took 九城..

cells.content: 九。秦拔我閼與、鄴，取九城。
cells.translation: 9th year. Qin拔我閼與、鄴, Took 九城..

cells.content: 十二。發四郡兵助魏擊楚。呂不韋卒。復嫪毐舍人遷蜀者。
cells.translation: 12th year. 發四郡兵助Wei擊Chu.呂不韋 passed away..復嫪毐舍人遷蜀者.

cells.content: 十三。桓齮擊平陽，殺趙扈輒，斬首十萬，因東擊。趙王之河南。彗星見。
cells.translation: 13th year. 桓齮擊平陽, 殺Zhao扈輒, 斬首十萬, 因東擊.Zhao王之河南.彗星見.

cells.content: 二。秦拔我平陽，敗扈輒，。斬首十萬。
cells.translation: 2nd year. 2nd year. Qin拔我平陽, Defeated 扈輒.斬首十萬..

cells.content: 十四。桓齮定平陽、武城、宜安。韓使非來，我殺非。韓王請為臣。
cells.translation: 14th year. 桓齮定平陽、武城、宜安.Han使非來, 我殺非.Han王請為臣.

cells.content: 十五。興軍至鄴。軍至太原。取狼孟。
cells.translation: 15th year. 興軍至鄴.軍至太原.Took 狼孟..

cells.content: 四。秦拔我狼孟、鄱吾，。軍鄴。
cells.translation: 4th year. Qin拔我狼孟、鄱吾.軍鄴.

cells.content: 二十三。太子丹質於秦，亡來歸。
cells.translation: 23rd year. 太子丹質於Qin, 亡來歸.

cells.content: 十六。置麗邑。發卒受韓南陽。
cells.translation: 16th year. 置麗邑.發 passed away.受Han南陽.

cells.content: 十七。內史騰擊得韓王安，盡取其地，置潁川郡。華陽太后薨。
cells.translation: 17th year. 內史騰擊得Han王安, 盡Took 其地, 置潁川郡.華陽太后 passed away...

cells.content: 十九。王翦拔趙，虜王遷邯鄲。帝太后薨。
cells.translation: 19th year. 王翦拔Zhao, Captured 王遷邯鄲.帝太后 passed away...

cells.content: 八。秦王翦虜王遷邯鄲。公子嘉自立為代王。
cells.translation: 8th year. Qin王翦Captured 王遷邯鄲.公子嘉自 ascended the throne.為代王..

cells.content: 十。幽王卒，弟郝立，為哀王。三月，負芻殺哀王。
cells.translation: 10th year. 幽王 passed away., 弟郝 ascended the throne., 為哀王.三月, 負芻殺哀王.

cells.content: 二十。燕太子使荊軻刺王，覺之。王翦將擊燕。
cells.translation: 20th year. Yan太子使荊軻刺王, 覺之.王翦將擊Yan.
King Jia of Wei, first year
King Jia of Dai, first year

cells.content: 楚王負芻元年。負芻，哀王庶兄。
cells.translation: Chu王負芻元年.負芻, 哀王庶兄.

cells.content: 二十八。太子丹使荊軻刺秦王，秦伐我。
cells.translation: 太子丹使荊軻刺Qin王, QinAttacked 我..
2nd year. 2nd year. Qin大破我, Took 十城..

cells.content: 二十九。秦拔我薊，得太子丹。王徙遼東。
cells.translation: Qin拔我薊, 得太子丹.王徙遼東.

cells.content: 二十二。王賁擊魏，得其王假，盡取其地。
cells.translation: 22nd year. 王賁擊Wei, 得其王假, 盡Took 其地..

cells.content: 二十三。王翦、蒙武擊破楚軍，殺其將項燕。
cells.translation: 23rd year. 王翦、蒙武擊破Chu軍, 殺其將項Yan.

cells.content: 二十四。王翦、蒙武破楚，虜其王負芻。
cells.translation: 王翦、蒙武破Chu, Captured 其王負芻..

cells.content: 二十五。王賁擊燕，虜王喜。又擊得代王嘉。五月，天下大酺。
cells.translation: 王賁擊Yan, Captured 王喜.又擊得代王嘉.五月, 天下大酺..

cells.content: 六。秦將王賁虜王嘉，秦滅趙。
cells.translation: 6th year. Qin將王賁Captured 王嘉, Qin滅Zhao..

cells.content: 三十三。秦虜王喜，拔遼東，秦滅燕。
cells.translation: 33rd year. QinCaptured 王喜, 拔遼東, Qin滅Yan..

cells.content: 二十六。王賁擊齊，虜王建。初并天下，立為皇帝。
cells.translation: 王賁擊Qi, Captured 王建.初并天下, ascended the throne.為皇帝..

cells.content: 四十四。秦虜王建。秦滅齊。
二十七更命河為「德水」。為金人十二。命民曰「黔首」。同天下書。分為三十六郡。
cells.translation: 二十七更命河為「德水」.為金人十二.命民曰「黔首」.同天下書.分為三十六郡.

cells.content: 二十八為阿房宮。之衡山。治馳道。帝之琅邪，道南郡入。為太極廟。賜戶三十，爵一級。
cells.translation: 二十八為阿房宮.之衡山.治馳道.帝之琅邪, 道南郡入.為太極廟.賜戶三十, 爵一級.

cells.content: 二十九郡縣大索十日。帝之琅邪，道上黨入。
cells.translation: 二十九郡縣大索十日.帝之琅邪, 道上黨入.

cells.content: 三十一更命臘曰「嘉平」。賜黔首里六石米二羊，以嘉平。大索二十日。
cells.translation: 三十一更命臘曰「嘉平」.賜黔首里六石米二羊, 以嘉平.大索二十日.

cells.content: 三十二帝之碣石，道上郡入。
cells.translation: 三十二帝之碣石, 道上郡入.

cells.content: 三十三遣諸逋亡及賈人贅婿略取陸梁，為桂林、南海、象郡，以適戍。西北取戎為三十四縣。築長城河上，蒙恬將三十萬。
cells.translation: 三十三遣諸逋亡及賈人贅婿略取陸梁, 為桂林、南海、象郡, 以適戍.西北取戎為三十四縣.築長城河上, 蒙恬將三十萬.

cells.content: 三十四適治獄不直者築長城。取南方越地。覆獄故失。
cells.translation: 三十四適治獄不直者築長城.取南方越地.覆獄故失.

cells.content: 三十五為直道，道九原，通甘泉。
cells.translation: 三十五為直道, 道九原, 通甘泉.

cells.content: 三十六徙民於北河、榆中，耐徙三處，拜爵一級。石畫下東郡，有文言「地分。」
cells.translation: 三十六徙民於北河、榆中, 耐徙三處, 拜爵一級.石畫下東郡, 有文言「地分.」

cells.content: 三十七十月，帝之會稽、琅邪，還至沙丘崩。子胡亥立，為二世皇帝。殺蒙恬。道九原入。復行錢。
cells.translation: 三十七十月, 帝之會稽、琅邪, 還至沙丘崩.子胡亥立, 為二世皇帝.殺蒙恬.道九原入.復行錢.

cells.content: 二世元年十月戊寅，大赦罪人。十一月，為兔園。十二月，就阿房宮。其九月，郡縣皆反。楚兵至戲，章邯擊卻之。出衛君角為庶人。
cells.translation: 二世元年十月戊寅, 大赦罪人.十一月, 為兔園.十二月, 就阿房宮.其九月, 郡縣皆反.Chu兵至戲, 章邯擊卻之.出Wei君角為庶人.

cells.content: 二將軍章邯、長史司馬欣、都尉董翳追楚兵至河。誅丞相斯、去疾，將軍馮劫。
cells.translation: 二將軍章邯、長史司馬欣、都尉董翳追Chu兵至河.誅丞相斯、去疾, 將軍馮劫.

cells.content: 三趙高反，二世自殺，高立二世兄子嬰。子嬰立，剌殺高，夷三族。諸侯入秦，嬰降，為項羽所殺。尋誅羽，天下屬漢。
cells.translation: 三Zhao高反, 二世自殺, 高立二世兄子嬰.子嬰立, 剌殺高, 夷三族.諸侯入Qin, 嬰降, 為項羽所殺.尋誅羽, 天下屬漢.
